heading: Why Socious Fund Works for Underrepresented Founders

feature1.title: Funding Without Wealthy Networks
feature1.description: Get funded based on community support through our matching pool system, regardless of your personal network.

feature2.title: Dual Funding Streams
feature2.description: Access both direct donations and grants, maximizing your fundraising potential.

feature3.title: Tax-Advantaged Giving
feature3.description: Offer your supporters tax deductions for their contributions through our 501(c)(3) status (application pending).
